channel.title: [508]Item list[508]
channel.description:
[b]Presenting the new 508 item list!!!!@@@
What it has The application has a full library of 508 list and it is splitted into godswords-list misc-list and default item list with a custom search/custom themes and pro filter(ascending/descending) something wrong is that the object list is currently on work
NOTICE THE 508 : LIST IS STILL ON WORK AND WILL SURE BE UPDATED AND PLEASE TELL ME IF ITS IN WRONG SECTION OR SOMETHING.. If you are tired of this software and you don't like it click [url=http://www.itemdb.biz]http://www.itemdb.biz[/url] for something else Pictures[/b]
[IMG]http://i1124.photobucket.com/albums/l565/allah999/full.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1124.photobucket.com/albums/l565/allah999/set.jpg[/img]
Download links Uppit - [url=http://up.ht/oxnW93]http://up.ht/oxnW93[/url] Uppit - Long link - [url=http://uppit.com/l97p2dzbj19m/508_Item_list_(created_by_alex).zip]http://uppit.com/l97p2dzbj19m/508_Item_list_(created_by_alex).zip[/url] [b]Credits Alex - 70%(PROGRAMMER) Umar -10% (SKINS) Zee 20%(Item list)[/b]

item.title: [508]Item list[508]
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

austin cadle:

Yeah I sure see a server download link in this topic after all it is the [size=36pt]SERVER DOWNLOADS[/size] section…

This is also downloads [size=18pt]for[/size] your server.

[size=20pt]RULE 4)[/size] NEW RULE: NON-SERVER & NON-CLIENT DOWNLOADS ARE ALLOWED (e.g. tools)! This has never been allowed before, but hey, we decided to give it a go. The tool posted must follow all rules and have an appropriate connection to RS2 private servers. If rules start to get broken and content gets out of hand, this rule will be revoked, and no longer will we allow non-server/non-client material to be posted.

[hr]

But I can’t say this is allowed.

[size=20pt]RULE 6)[/size] No *.bat / list files PERIOD! There are stupid and a waste of time to bother with. Learn to program with a real language. If you’re beatiful server includes one of these in the topic itself (if its included in the download its okay) then it’ll be locked and you’ll be punished. Forgot to mention, they only work on Windows, too. Also lists aren’t really a download as it is usually a text file with some scribbles in it. The official Moparscape client already has a list. USE IT!

[hr]

If you’re going to troll, l2trolltherightway.

Read full topic
